Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Berwyn
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Berwyn due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Berwyn due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Chicago
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Chicago due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Chicago due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
